name: XmlStreamReader

constructors.name: XmlStreamReader
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the XmlStreamReader class for the specified XML input.

methods.name: getAttributeCount
methods.description: Returns the number of attributes on the start element, excluding namespace definitions.

methods.name: getAttributeLocalName
methods.description: Returns the local name of the attribute at the specified index.

methods.name: getAttributeNamespace
methods.description: Returns the namespace URI of the attribute at the specified index.

methods.name: getAttributePrefix
methods.description: Returns the prefix of this attribute at the specified index.

methods.name: getAttributeType
methods.description: Returns the XML type of the attribute at the specified index.

methods.name: getAttributeValue
methods.signature: public String getAttributeValue(String namespaceUri, String localName)
methods.description: Returns the value of the attribute in the specified localName at the specified URI.

methods.name: getAttributeValueAt
methods.description: Returns the value of the attribute at the specified index.

methods.name: getEventType
methods.description: Returns the type of XML event the cursor is pointing to.

methods.name: getLocalName
methods.description: Returns the local name of the current event.

methods.name: getLocation
methods.description: Return the current location of the cursor.

methods.name: getNamespace
methods.description: If the current event is a start element or end element, this method returns the URI of the prefix or the default namespace.

methods.name: getNamespaceCount
methods.description: Returns the number of namespaces declared on a start element or end element.

methods.name: getNamespacePrefix
methods.description: Returns the prefix for the namespace declared at the index.

methods.name: getNamespaceURI
methods.description: Return the URI for the given prefix.

methods.name: getNamespaceURIAt
methods.description: Returns the URI for the namespace declared at the index.

methods.name: getPIData
methods.description: Returns the data section of a processing instruction.

methods.name: getPITarget
methods.description: Returns the target section of a processing instruction.

methods.name: getPrefix
methods.description: Returns the prefix of the current XML event or null if the event does not have a prefix.

methods.name: getText
methods.description: Returns the current value of the XML event as a string.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Returns the XML version specified on the XML declaration. Returns null if none was declared.

methods.name: hasName
methods.description: Returns true if the current XML event has a name. Returns false otherwise.

methods.name: hasNext
methods.description: Returns true if there are more  XML events and false if there are no more XML events.

methods.name: hasText
methods.description: Returns true if the current event has text, false otherwise.

methods.name: isCharacters
methods.description: Returns true if the cursor points to a character data XML event. Otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isEndElement
methods.description: Returns true if the cursor points to an end tag. Otherwise, it returns false.

methods.name: isStartElement
methods.description: Returns true if the cursor points to a start tag. Otherwise, it returns false.

methods.name: isWhiteSpace
methods.description: Returns true if the cursor points to a character data XML event that consists of all white space. Otherwise it returns false.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Reads the next XML event. A processor may return all contiguous character data in a single chunk, or it may split it into several chunks. Returns an integer which indicates the type of event.

methods.name: nextTag
methods.description: Skips any white space (the isWhiteSpace method returns true), comment, or processing instruction XML events, until a start element or end element is reached. Returns the index for that XML event.

methods.name: setCoalescing
methods.description: If you specify true for returnAsSingleBlock, text is returned in a single block, from a start element to the first end element or the next start element, whichever comes first. If you specify it as false, the parser may return text in multiple blocks.

methods.name: setNamespaceAware
methods.description: If you specify true for isNamespaceAware, the parser recognizes namespace. If you specify it as false, the parser does not. The default value is true.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string containing the length of the input XML given to XmlStreamReader and the first 50 characters of the input XML.

description: The XmlStreamReader class provides methods for forward, read-only access to XML data. You can pull data from XML or skip unwanted events. You can parse nested XML content that’s up to 50 nodes deep.
